menuSearch placeholder: Do you have somthing in mind?
addOffer step-1 intro: in this page you will go through few steps to set-up and fill in your offer information. Please feel comfortable and take your time during this process. If anything goes wrong, you can remove the offer and start another one from scratch. Once it is done, your offer will be published
addOffer step-6 amenities: Do you have any of these amenities?
addOffer step-8 title: Provide a short title for your place
addOffer step-8 title part-2: please don't write a long description, because the next step will be the description
addOffer step-9 description part-2: feel free to add as much information as you can, this section can be long.
addOffer step-10 price: Choose a price that suits you!
addOffer step-10 price part-2: please note that the price is by /night, not month!
addOffer finalStep part-1: Your offer has been created successfully!
addOffer finalStep part-2: Give it some time untill people can see your offer
